snippet: Prime Minister Victor Ponta is accused of forgery, money laundering and being an accessory to tax evasion, and will face charges in Romania’s top court.
abstract: Romanian court makes Prime Minister Victor Ponta country's first sitting leader to face indictment by charging him with forgery, money laundering and other charges, which he denies.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Victor Ponta is accused of forgery, money laundering and being an accessory to tax evasion, and will face charges in Romania’s top court.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Romania: Prime Minister Is Indicted in Graft Case
headline.main: Romanian Prime Minister to Face Corruption Trial
